title: 'Blacklist' filming in Rockland today
text:
'Blacklist' filming in Rockland today "Blacklist" has put Piermont on its list of shooting locations. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs 'Blacklist' filming in Rockland today Latoya West , latoyakwest@gmail.com 5:56 p.m. EDT September 29, 2015 
"Blacklist" has put Piermont on its list of shooting locations. 
The NBC hit, which stars James Spader as a criminal mastermind who joins forces with the FBI, is filming Tuesday at two Piermont locations: The View on the Hudson Restaurant's parking lot and the end of the pier on Ferry Road. 
According to a notice distributed by the show's production company, the shoot will involve prop weapons, prop vehicles and actors dressed in police uniforms. Filming will take end at approximately 10 p.m. 
The third season of "Blacklist," which frequently shoots in Yonkers, will premiere Oct. 1 on NBC. Read or Share this story: http://lohud.us/1FBIiex Most Popular
